text: The Long Night is a 1947 American crime drama movie directed by Anatole Litvak and is the remake of the 1939 French movie Le Jour Se LÃ¨ve. It stars Henry Fonda, Barbara Bel Geddes, Vincent Price, Ann Dvorak, Howard Freeman, Moroni Olsen, Queenie Smith and distributed by RKO Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Anatole Litvak
title: The Long Night (1947 movie)
